4. Emergency Contact Numbers

Emergency Contact Numbers
=========================

POLICE
------

* For EMERGENCY, call 911.
* For non-emergency, call 512-974-0845 ext. 3 ~or~ call 311.
* To contact the West Lake Hills PD Administrative Office, call 512-327-1195. If calling after-hours, you may leave a message and staff will respond the next business day.

WATER or WASTEWATER
-------------------

* Water District #10 for Water Information and to Report Outages - Phone 512-327-2230 - After Hours 512-246-1400 - [Online website](https://www.waterdistrict10.org/).
* For EMERGENCY, call Crossroads Utility at 512-246-1400.

POWER OUTAGE
------------

* Contact AUSTIN ENERGY for Electricity information.
* To report outages, trees in power lines, and damaged electrical poles - phone 512-322-9100 or 311 - [Report Online](https://austinenergy.com/outages).
* [Austin Energy presentation](https://www.westlakehills.org/DocumentCenter/View/3527/Austin-Energy---West-Lake-Hills-Presentation-8-28-23) for West Lake Hills.

### Report a Natural Gas Odor or Emergency

Leave the area immediately and then call 911 and 800-959-5325.

FIRE DEPARTMENT
---------------

* For EMERGENCY, call 911.
* For non-emergency, call 512-539-3400 or by [Email](mailto:info@WestlakeFD.org).

SPECTRUM BUSINESS
-----------------

If you lose power during a storm, please contact your local utility company for updates. Once power is restored and conditions are safe, Spectrum technicians will resolve any service issues.

 Use this link to the[Spectrum Storm Center](https://www.spectrumbusiness.net/page/spectrum-business-storm-center) for information regarding service and power outages, notifications, and tips to stay connected during the storm. For information on how to prepare for an upcoming storm, please visit [Spectrum Storm Prep](https://www.spectrumbusiness.net/support/general/spectrum-business-storm-preparation).

Once you have signed up for notifications, Spectrum will send you a message to let you know if your Spectrum service is affected. Internet customers can stay connected using Spectrum WiFi access points nationwide. [Find one near you](https://www.spectrum.com/internet/wifi-access-points?opredirect=wifi-hotspots%3Fopredirect%3Dwifi-access-points%3Fopredirect%3Dwifi-hotspots&opredirect=wifi-hotspots).

CITY CODE VIOLATIONS
--------------------

Reporting of illicit discharging or other city code violations within the City online or call 512-327-3628.

### Call 811 Before You Dig

To prevent injury, damage and service outages, it's important that all underground utility lines be identified BEFORE any digging project begins. Whether you're planting a tree, tilling soil, installing a deck or sprinkler system or setting fence posts, always remember to contact **both**services below at least two (2) full business days before you plan to dig to allow all utility line locations to be marked. Anyone who is planning a project that involves digging should always call 811 or Crossroads before they dig.

* For gas, electric and telecom - Call 811 on your phone
* For water and sewer - Contact Crossroads
  + Website:  <https://crossroadsus.com/customer-service/utility-line-locate-request/>
  + Email:  [locate@crossroadsus.com](mailto:locate@crossroadsus.com)
  + Phone: (512) 246-1400
